arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يَبۡغُونَ عَنۡهَا حِوَلٗا
footnotes: Wataneemeka milele, wala hawatataka badala yake chochote.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā lā yabghūna ʿanhā ḥiwalan
